titles.title: Affordable Books for College Act
Affordable Books for College Act

To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program to support college and university communities that wish to expand their book store services and savings for students through the creation of course material rental programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Affordable Books for College Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program of loans to expand college bookstore services to provide students with the option to rent course materials.
Directs the Secretary of Education to make such loans to a limited number of eligible entities, as well as feasibility study grants prior to loan applications.
